verses.text: I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into my \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, my \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, \add my\add* \w spouse|strong="H3618"\w*: I have \w gathered|strong="H0717"\w* my \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w* with my \w spice|strong="H1313"\w*; I have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* my \w honeycomb|strong="H3293"\w* with my \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*; I have \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* my \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* with my \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*: \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, O \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*; \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, yea, drink \w abundantly|strong="H7937"\w*, O \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*.\f + \fr 5.1 \ft yea…: or, and be drunken with loves\f*

¶ I \w sleep|strong="H3463"\w*, but my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w waketh|strong="H5782"\w*: \add it is\add* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* that \w knocketh|strong="H1849"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Open|strong="H6605"\w* to me, my \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, my \w love|strong="H7474"\w*, my \w dove|strong="H3123"\w*, my \w undefiled|strong="H8535"\w*: for my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* is \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*, \add and\add* my \w locks|strong="H6977"\w* with the \w drops|strong="H7447"\w* of the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

I have put \w off|strong="H6584"\w* my \w coat|strong="H3801"\w*; \w how|strong="H0349"\w* shall I put it \w on|strong="H3847"\w*? I have \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; \w how|strong="H0349"\w* shall I \w defile|strong="H2936"\w* them?

My \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* put \w in|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H4480"\w* the \w hole|strong="H2356"\w* \add of the door\add*, and my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* were \w moved|strong="H1993"\w* for him.\f + \fr 5.4 \ft for him: or, (as some read) in me\f*

I rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w open|strong="H6605"\w* to my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*; and my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w dropped|strong="H5197"\w* \add with\add* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, and my \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* \add with\add* sweet \w smelling|strong="H5674"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, upon the \w handles|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w lock|strong="H4514"\w*.\f + \fr 5.5 \ft sweet…: Heb. passing, or, running about\f*

I \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* to my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*; but my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* had \w withdrawn|strong="H2559"\w* himself, \add and\add* was \w gone|strong="H5674"\w*: my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w failed|strong="H3318"\w* when he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*: I \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him, but I could not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* him; I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him, but he gave me no \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*.

The \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w* that went \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* me, they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* me, they \w wounded|strong="H6481"\w* me; the \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* took \w away|strong="H5375"\w* my \w veil|strong="H7289"\w* from me.

I \w charge|strong="H7650"\w* you, O \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, if ye \w find|strong="H4672"\w* my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, that ye \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* him, that I \add am\add* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* of \w love|strong="H0160"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft that ye: Heb. what, etc\f*

¶ What \add is\add* thy \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* more than \add another\add* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, O thou \w fairest|strong="H3303"\w* among \w women|strong="H0802"\w*? what \add is\add* thy \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* more than \add another\add* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, that \w thou|strong="H3602"\w* dost so \w charge|strong="H7650"\w* us?

My \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \add is\add* \w white|strong="H6703"\w* and \w ruddy|strong="H0122"\w*, the \w chiefest|strong="H1713"\w* among ten \w thousand|strong="H7233"\w*.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft the chiefest: Heb. a standard-bearer\f*

His \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \add is as\add* the \w most|strong="H3800"\w* fine \w gold|strong="H6337"\w*, his \w locks|strong="H6977"\w* \add are\add* \w bushy|strong="H8534"\w*, \add and\add* \w black|strong="H7838"\w* as a \w raven|strong="H6158"\w*.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft bushy: or, curled\f*

His \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add are\add* as \add the eyes\add* of \w doves|strong="H3123"\w* by the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, \add and\add* fitly \w set|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 5.12 \ft fitly…: Heb. sitting in fulness, that is, fitly placed, and set as a precious stone in the foil of a ring\f*

His \w cheeks|strong="H3895"\w* \add are\add* as a \w bed|strong="H6170"\w* of \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \add as\add* \w sweet|strong="H4840"\w* \w flowers|strong="H4026"\w*: his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add like\add* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*, \w dropping|strong="H5197"\w* sweet \w smelling|strong="H5674"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft sweet flowers: or, towers of perfumes\f*

His \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add are as\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H1550"\w* \w set|strong="H4390"\w* with the \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*: his \w belly|strong="H4578"\w* \add is as\add* \w bright|strong="H6247"\w* \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w overlaid|strong="H5968"\w* \add with\add* \w sapphires|strong="H5601"\w*.

His \w legs|strong="H7785"\w* \add are as\add* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of \w marble|strong="H8336"\w*, \w set|strong="H3245"\w* upon \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of fine \w gold|strong="H6337"\w*: his \w countenance|strong="H4758"\w* \add is\add* as \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \w excellent|strong="H0977"\w* as the \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*.

His \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* \add is\add* most \w sweet|strong="H4477"\w*: yea, he \add is\add* altogether \w lovely|strong="H4261"\w*. This \add is\add* my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, and this \add is\add* my \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, O \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 5.16 \ft mouth: Heb. palate\f*
